dtliExcerpt: David Byrne and Fatboy Slim's disco-infused musical about Imelda Marcos makes an exhilarating transition to Broadway, transforming the Broadway Theatre into a pulsating dance club.
bwwExcerpt: I was glad I chose a spot on the floor. Things do get a bit crowded, although nowhere near as claustrophobic as the original downtown version of the show in 2013. Fatboy Slim’s jolting tunes, melodic and insistent, send scintillating vibrations through your nervous system; you can’t help but plug in...
showScoreExcerpt: David Byrne and Fatboy Slim's disco-infused musical about Imelda Marcos makes an exhilarating transition to Broadway, transforming the Broadway Theatre into a pulsating dance club.
